item.content:encoded: Second fire in five weeks burns Missouri mosque http://t.co/HqY3TkSu A second fire in less than five weeks occurred at a mosque in Joplin, Missouri early Monday morning. In honor of Andrew, we are proud to present a brand new weekly feature entitled #WAR, where we will choose a video that reminds us all of the unique and powerful ways in which he chose to fight for all that he believed, in an effort to level the playing field such that more voices could be heard. item.content:encoded: GOP pounces on report of WH aide making $100G off Iran-tied firm http://t.co/5AzKWHnA Republicans pounced on a report Monday that said top White House adviser David Plouffe took a $100,000 speaking fee from an Iran-tied firm whose technology may have been used to track dissidents, claiming Plouffe's involvement could represent a loophole in sanctions against the regime.  Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Reports: Sikh Temple Shooter Was A White Supremacist, Part Of Growing Trend Of Anti-Sikh Violence
item.description: Reports: Sikh Temple Shooter Was A White Supremacist, Part Of Growing Trend Of Anti-Sikh Violence http://t.co/8SfhTFvE
item.content:encoded: Reports: Sikh Temple Shooter Was A White Supremacist, Part Of Growing Trend Of Anti-Sikh Violence http://t.co/8SfhTFvE Several reports out this morning indicate that Wade Michael Page, the army veteran who is suspected of killing six and injuring three at a Sikh temple over the weekend, was a white supremacist and a "skinhead." According to the Southern Poverty Law Center, Page -- who was killed in a firefight with police -- even played in a white-power band that had ties to neo-Nazis. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: thinkprogress.org

item.title: RECAP: Rover Lands On Mars
item.description: LIVE UPDATES: Rover To Land On Mars Tonight http://t.co/2yPsu4Za
item.content:encoded: LIVE UPDATES: Rover To Land On Mars Tonight http://t.co/2yPsu4Za NASA's Mars rover Curiosity has touched down on the surface of the Red Planet, completing a 154-million-mile journey, and marking the beginning of a new era in planetary exploration. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com
